column14: While approaching Bishkiek for a fuel stop, the cargo plane crashed past the end of the runway destroying 23 houses. The weather at the time of the accident was freezing fog.

column3: Australian Corporate Jet Centres PTY. LTD
column14: The charter flight was just seconds into its flight when it was observed flying low, before it nose diving into a building at a shopping center and bursting into flames. The pilot made two mayday calls before the aircraft crashed. It is reported the plane suffered engine failure.

The helicopter crashed on a highway after hitting a TV tower, six minutes after taking off. The helicopter was carrying an executive of the Eczacibasi group of companies, four of his Russian guests and two pilots.
While en route the air transport plane collided with Mount Vumba in poor weather conditions.
